Durable and reusable, these car detailing towels are machine washable and maintain their softness and performance through hundreds of washes. The 24-pack value ensures you always have a fresh towel ready for every step of the detailing process, from exterior paint correction to interior dusting and glass cleaning. Perfect for cars, trucks, motorcycles, RVs, boats, and household cleaning tasks, the MIC_506_24 Gold microfiber cleaning towel deliver professional-grade performance for car enthusiasts and auto detailers alike.
